title: An 'Analog' Process Needing a Digital Intelligence Upgrade
subtitle: Clinical trials are plagued by inefficiencies that cost billions and delay life-saving treatments

cards.title: Slow
cards.description: Manual iteration and resource-intensive workload. Critical data buried in massive information volumes.

cards.title: Costly
cards.description: Average cost to get a drug to market: $2.6B. Delays cost millions (Avg $40K/day in Phase 3).

cards.title: Opaque
cards.description: Black-box decision making without audit trails. Volume of information means research isn't exhaustive.

cards.title: Risky
cards.description: Bias leading to regulatory and commercial failures. Design complexity causes failures and delays.

cards.title: Siloed
cards.description: Complex workflows that don't engage ALL stakeholders lead to designs that can't be executed.
